mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id, b.status, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.request, b.guests_num, b.user_id AS guest_id, u.name AS guest_name, u.email AS guest_email, u.phone_number AS guest_phone, r.room_id, r.title AS room_title, r.address AS room_address, r.price AS room_price, r.building_type, r.max_guests, (SELECT file_url FROM image_files WHERE entity_id = r.room_id AND entity_type = 'rooms' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS room_image_url FROM books b JOIN rooms r ON b.room_id = r.room_id JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.book_id DESC;
